    int
    getTarget(int srcPokemonIdx, int tgtPokemonIdx)
    public PokemonView[] getTargets(PokemonView src, PokemonView tgt) { PokemonView targets[] = new PokemonView[2]; switch(this.getTarget()) { case CASTER: targets[0] = src; break; case OPPONENT: targets[1] = tgt; break; case BOTH: targets[0] = src; targets[1] = tgt; break; default: System.err.println("[ERROR] Callback.getTargets: unknown target [" + this.getTarget() + "]"); System.exit(1); } return targets; }
    abstract void
    reset()
    public Pair<Pokemon, Pokemon> getUpdatedReferences(Battle battle, Pokemon oldSrc, Pokemon oldTgt) { if(!oldSrc.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) && !oldSrc.equals(battle.getTeam2().getActivePokemon())) { // error } if(!oldTgt.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) && !oldTgt.equals(battle.getTeam2().getActivePokemon())) { // error } Pokemon newSrc = (oldSrc.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) ? battle.getTeam1() : battle.getTeam2()).getActivePokemon(); Pokemon newTgt = (oldTgt.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) ? battle.getTeam1() : battle.getTeam2()).getActivePokemon(); return new Pair<Pokemon, Pokemon>(newSrc, newTgt); }

      public PokemonView[] getTargets(PokemonView src, PokemonView tgt) { PokemonView targets[] = new PokemonView[2]; switch(this.getTarget()) { case CASTER: targets[0] = src; break; case OPPONENT: targets[1] = tgt; break; case BOTH: targets[0] = src; targets[1] = tgt; break; default: System.err.println("[ERROR] Callback.getTargets: unknown target [" + this.getTarget() + "]"); System.exit(1); } return targets; }

      public Pair<Pokemon, Pokemon> getUpdatedReferences(Battle battle, Pokemon oldSrc, Pokemon oldTgt) { if(!oldSrc.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) && !oldSrc.equals(battle.getTeam2().getActivePokemon())) { // error } if(!oldTgt.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) && !oldTgt.equals(battle.getTeam2().getActivePokemon())) { // error } Pokemon newSrc = (oldSrc.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) ? battle.getTeam1() : battle.getTeam2()).getActivePokemon(); Pokemon newTgt = (oldTgt.equals(battle.getTeam1().getActivePokemon()) ? battle.getTeam1() : battle.getTeam2()).getActivePokemon(); return new Pair<Pokemon, Pokemon>(newSrc, newTgt); }
